title: Program for Improving Understanding of Mathematical Concept Structures through Phonemic Awareness Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic phonemic awareness and foundational math problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80%+ accuracy in phoneme segmentation and blending tasks for multisyllabic mathematical terms (≥3 syllables)
